name: First Call Resolutioners
descrip: Increase your individual and the team's first call resolution.
howToWin: The team must achieve 100 first call resolutions this week.

name: Super Sonic
descrip: Resolve customer problems in sonic speed.
howToWin: Everyone in the team must reduce their average handle time.

name: Reach For The Stars
descrip: Try your hand at rising in the ranks this week.
howToWin: Improve your metric numbers this week.
